reapack.name: 7R Adds [Frozen] to Frozen Track's Name.lua
reapack.desc: 7R Adds/Removes [Frozen] to Frozen Track's Name based on Undo History

version.author: 7thResonance
version.changelog: Reacts to Undo History: adds [Frozen] when tracks are frozen, removes it when unfrozen. SWS required.
